title: Join my Oceanic LoL Facebook page
body: Hey guys I am the owner of a league of legends Facebook page were we hold daily competitions and will be starting weekly giveaways really soon. The community is really active and all really kind. I will also be holding quarterly tournaments with massive rewards so if you want to take part in them join my page. The kind of daily competitions include; Support only game, Tank only games, 2v2 competitions, 1v1 competitions, Who am I( were I will say a champions lore and you guees who they are) and I will also be doing weekly top 5's. If this sounds like something you would be intrested in head over the the page and ask to join! Cya soon!
